channel.title: POPSUGAR Celebrity
channel.description: POPSUGAR Celebrity features breaking news, hot photos, amazing videos and event recaps on the day’s most popular stars.

item.title: The Stars Come Out For the Oscars Red Carpet!
item.description: The Oscars are finally here, and A-listers like Bradley Cooper, Lupita Nyong'o, and Matthew McConaughey will all hitting the red carpet for their big night at the Academy Awards. Even with some rainy red carpet weather earlier, there's no shortage of star power in LA tonight. From host Ellen DeGeneres and nominees like Leonardo DiCaprio and Jennifer Lawrence to presenters Kate Hudson, Penélope Cruz, and Channing Tatum, we're tracking all the glamorous arrivals right here. Keep reading to see all the celebrities making an entrance, and be sure to vote for your favorite red carpet looks tonight in our fashion and beauty polls!
item.dc:creator: Brittney Stephens
item.search_title: Celebrities on the Oscars Red Carpet 2014 | Pictures

item.title: Join Our Live Oscars Show Now!
item.description: click here to watch live
item.dc:creator: Molly Goodson
item.search_title: Oscars Live Feed 2014

item.title: Look Who's Bringing Sexy Back to the Oscars
item.description: Need more reasons to tune in to the Oscars tonight? How about this: the show will feature a ton of sexy A-list guys plus some amazing performers. Zac Efron and Joseph Gordon-Levitt will join nominee Matthew McConaughey as presenters, while U2, Frozen's Idina Menzel, and more will perform their nominated songs. Oh, Pink is also going to make a "special appearance." Let's hope that means "crazy-impressive acrobatic performance." Take a look to see who will be on the stage this year!
item.dc:creator: Maggie Pehanick
item.search_title: Oscars Presenters and Performers 2014

item.title: Why Sandra Bullock Is Hollywood's Miss Congeniality
item.description: Sandra Bullock's career took off at lightning speed, and she doesn't seem to be slowing down anytime soon. With her wide range of roles in award-winning films and her role as a real-life Miss Congeniality, Sandy is one to watch closely this Sunday. Catch up on the Academy Award nominee in our Oscars profile.
item.dc:creator: Becca Frucht
item.search_title: Sandra Bullock Oscars Profile | Video

item.title: Revisit Iconic Oscars Moments - From Angelina's Leg to Jennifer's Fall
item.description:
The Oscars are finally here! We're gearing up for the star-studded night by taking a look back at some of the Academy Awards' most iconic moments. Way back in 1998, Ben Affleck and Matt Damon won their first statues for Good Will Hunting and showed off their excitement in the press room, Adrien Brody laid a big kiss on Halle Berry in 2003, Angelina Jolie's right leg became famous when she posed with Brad Pitt for the 2012 show, and Jennifer Lawrence made the audience gasp when she tripped up the stairs en route to accept her 2013 best actress award for Silver Linings Playbook

For these moments and many more, keep scrolling through the historic photos, and then gear up for the Academy Awards by voting in our Oscars ballot or printing out one of your own.
item.dc:creator: Brittney Stephens
item.search_title: Pictures of Iconic Oscar Moments

item.title: Jared Leto Calls Lupita Nyong'o His "Future Ex-Wife"
item.description: Jared Leto is heading into the Academy Awards with yet another win! The actor's winning streak continued at the Spirit Awards in Santa Monica on Saturday. Just one day before the Oscars, the actor nabbed the best supporting male award for his portrayal of a transgendered person in Dallas Buyers Club. According to reports, Jared cracked a few jokes in his acceptance speech. He said he wanted to thank "all the women I’ve been with, and all the women who think they’ve been with me." Jared also added, "My future ex-wife - Lupita, I’m thinking of you." Before reclaiming the spotlight on stage, Jared brought his signature antics to the red carpet. Keep reading to see Jared in all his glory!
item.dc:creator: Nick Maslow
item.search_title: Jared Leto Says Lupita Nyong'o Is His Future Ex-Wife

item.title: Toss Some Beads Over Here, Ian!
item.description:
Ian Somerhalder took smoldering to a whole new level at the Krewe of Endymion Parade in New Orleans on Saturday. The Vampire Diaries star - and Louisiana native - got playful throwing show-themed beads and cups (with his face on them) at the crowd but then turned things sexy as he licked the necklaces, blew kisses at the crowd, and even showed off his musical side with a trombone. Try not to faint as you scroll through the photos and videos below, which include him as a cop, crazy selfies, purple boas, a tip of his fedora, and that signature smirk. And the icing on the king cake? He also brought along his mom and sister!

Source: Getty
item.dc:creator: Alyse Whitney
item.search_title: Ian Somerhalder at Mardi Gras For Krewe of Endymion Parade

item.title: Are You Excited to See Lady Gaga at the Oscars?
item.description: Just when you thought the Oscars presenters and performers lineup was set in stone, organizers have surprised us with a colorful addition: Lady Gaga. That's right - Gaga is joining Hollywood's A-list for the biggest film celebration of the year. While she's no stranger to video production (she certainly knows how to work a camera in her music videos), she's not directly connected to this year's nominated movies or soundtracks. The question on everyone's minds: does she have plans to showcase her powerhouse vocals, present an award, score some selfies with Lupita Nyong'o, grace the red carpet in an egg, or all of the above? We'll have to wait for the big show to find out. Sound off below on your reaction to Gaga's Oscars news, and later, watch all the excitement during POPSUGAR's live red carpet and Oscars viewing party.
item.dc:creator: Nick Maslow
item.search_title: Lady Gaga Attending the 2014 Oscars | Poll

item.title: Taylor Gets In on the Oscars Fun With Oprah and Meryl
item.description: It wouldn't be Oscars weekend without a popular party courtesy of The Weinstein Company! Oprah Winfrey, Meryl Streep, Taylor Swift, and Chiwetel Ejiofor were just a few of the celebrities who attended the bash at the ritzy Montage in Beverly Hills on Saturday. Most of the stars wore black and white attire to the event. There were a few exceptions, including Karlie Kloss, who donned a formfitting red dress. The A-list has been gearing up for the Oscars all weekend, stepping out for several star-studded parties. Get in on the award season fun by joining POPSUGAR for our live Oscars red carpet and viewing party!
item.dc:creator: Nick Maslow
item.search_title: Weinstein Company's Oscars Party 2014

item.title: It's Ellen's World, and We're Just Living in It
item.description:
Source: ABC

Tonight, Ellen DeGeneres will take the stage to host the Oscars for her second time, and we couldn't be more excited to see what the hilarious comedienne has in store. Remember when she vacuumed at the 2007 Academy Awards? Priceless. The 2014 Oscars trailer gave us a glimpse into what's to come during the show, and Ellen's definitely got the jokes, the moves, and plenty of Hollywood friends to help her pull it off again this year. In anticipation of the big night, fill out our Oscars ballot, and get excited for what promises to be yet another successful hosting gig by taking a look at the many reasons Ellen's so lovable.

Front Page Image Source: Getty / Christopher Polk
item.dc:creator: Laura Marie Meyers
item.search_title: Funny Ellen DeGeneres GIFs

item.title: Jimmy Fallon Suits Up For the Polar Plunge - in 8 Degree Temps!
item.description:
Forget about the polar vortex - it was all about the Polar Plunge today as Tonight Show host Jimmy Fallon took a dip in the icy waters of Lake Michigan. Following a challenge from Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel, the two were led out by a parade of bagpipe players before running into the slushy, frozen lake this morning. While Jimmy - or as he's known on Twitter now, #SwimmyFallon - wore a suit when he took the plunge, many others went shirtless in bathing suits or shorts as they sped in and out of the water. More than 3,000 people participated in the annual fundraiser for the Chicago Special Olympics this year, and in case you were wondering, it was a chilly eight degrees in the Windy City during the event, with water temperatures 30 or below. Jimmy survived, though, captioning his triumphant Instagram photo, "Officially PLUNGED!!!!! Thank you Chicago!!! Thank you Mayor. #polarplunge #coldneverbotheredmeanyway #frozen." His hilarious reaction is just one of his many viral moments - check out some of his others from The Tonight Show here.

Source: Instagram user jimmyfallon
item.dc:creator: Alyse Whitney
item.search_title: Watch Jimmy Fallon Take the Polar Plunge in Chicago

item.title: Beyoncé and Jay Z Hit the Town After Taking the Stage in London
item.description:
Beyoncé fans received a big treat when her husband, Jay Z, joined her for a performance of "Drunk in Love" during her first of four Mrs. Carter Show World Tour dates at the O2 arena in London on Saturday, and the couple continued their fun after the show. The duo was spotted leaving dinner and then a nightclub in the wee hours of the morning, all smiles as Jay shone a flashlight to illuminate their path to a waiting car. Their weekend together comes after a recent tropical vacation, which Beyoncé documented on Tumblr. Though they're out of their swimsuits and without Blue Ivy for the night, it looks like Mr. and Mrs. Carter are having just as much fun overseas as they did on the beach.

Source: WENN.com
item.dc:creator: Alyse Whitney
item.search_title: Beyonce and Jay Z Out in London

item.title: Sienna and Tom Make an Oscars Weekend Appearance
item.description: Oscars weekend isn't slowing down, with even more stars stepping out for Chanel's pre-Oscars dinner on Saturday night. There have been plenty of parties so far, and the latest brought Sienna Miller, Tom Sturridge, Anne Hathaway, Michael B. Jordan, and Emilia Clarke to LA's Madeo restaurant. With just hours to go before the Academy Awards kick off, make sure you're ready for the big show with our Oscars cheat sheet that has everything you need to know about Hollywood's biggest event - and don't forget to fill out an Oscars ballot!
item.dc:creator: Lauren Turner
item.search_title: Chanel Oscars Dinner 2014

item.title: Adam Driver Gets a Major Role in the New Star Wars
item.description: Adam Driver is in final negotiations for a huge role in Star Wars: Episode VII, Joseph Gordon-Levitt is about to soar to major heights, Amanda Seyfried is taking over for Mila Kunis, and Bradley Cooper will be in another movie with "American" in the title. Take a look through the biggest casting deals of the week!
item.dc:creator: Maggie Pehanick
item.search_title: Adam Driver Joins Star Wars

item.title: Who's Got Spirit? Stars Shine at Hollywood's Indie Award Show
item.description: Celebrities brought their A-game to the Spirit Awards in Santa Monica on Saturday, showing us they won't allow rainy weather to damper the award season excitement. Mud costars Matthew McConaughey and Reese Witherspoon grabbed everyone's attention at the mic, and Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie shared a sweet moment with winner Lupita Nyong'o. Meanwhile, Jared Leto brought on the laughs with his hilarious acceptance speech and later posed for a snap with Lupita and her mom. Keep scrolling to see all the fun unfold, and don't forget to check out all the red carpet arrivals!
item.dc:creator: Nick Maslow
item.search_title: Celebrities at the Spirit Awards 2014 | Show Photos

item.title: Famous Faces Hit the Spirit Awards Red Carpet
item.description: Some of the biggest names in Hollywood gathered in Santa Monica to kick off Oscars weekend with the Spirit Awards on Saturday. Actors and actresses like Jared Leto, Cate Blanchett, and Reese Witherspoon stepped out for the big event, and the 2014 Spirit Award winners included both Jared and Cate, along with award season darlings Matthew McConaughey and Lupita Nyong'o. The Spirit Awards are independent film's answer to the Oscars, bringing some award season darlings as well as some surprising nominations into the spotlight. Take a look at all the red carpet arrivals at this year's Spirit Awards!
item.dc:creator: Laura Marie Meyers
item.search_title: Celebrities on the Spirit Awards Red Carpet 2014 | Pictures

item.title: Around the World With the Week's Best Photos
item.description: Hollywood heavyweights channeled their political sides this week, with celebrities like Ben Affleck, Amy Poehler, and Seth Rogen speaking out for causes they care about. Meanwhile, US soldiers were welcomed home with opens arms after a nine-month deployment, the touching moments caught on camera as men and women reunited with their loved ones. Across the pond, British royals made an appearance, models hit the Paris runway, and Carnival brought out elaborate costumes. See all that and more with the week's best snaps from across the globe!
item.dc:creator: Laura Marie Meyers
item.search_title: US Soldiers Reunite With Families in Fort Knox

item.title: Party On! All the Best Oscars Bashes
item.description: Hollywood knows how to party, and Oscars weekend is no exception! As anticipation mounts for the big show on Sunday, the stars have been warming up for the red carpet all week at celebrations across LA. On Saturday, Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie buddied up with Lupita Nyong'o during a dinner for 12 Years a Slave at the famed Sunset Tower. Just the day before, Jared Leto was the center of attention during Los Angeles Confidential magazine's bash at the SLS Hotel, and Cate Blanchett joined Anna Kendrick and Joshua Jackson for a swanky soiree at Giorgio Armani's Beverly Hills boutique. Meanwhile, Diane Kruger and Rosario Dawson stunned at the National Hispanic Media Coalition Impact Awards Gala. Earlier in the week, Amy Adams stayed close to fiancé Darren Le Gallo at a party celebrating American Hustle, and Naomi Watts hosted a glamorous Bulgari bash with an appearance from Kate Hudson. Keep scrolling for the best Oscars parties so far, and make sure to fill out our Oscars ballot for a chance to win $1,000!
item.dc:creator: Lauren Turner
item.search_title: Oscars 2014 Party Pictures

item.title: Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie Celebrate a Special Win
item.description: Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie made an appearance at Saturday's Spirit Awards, where Brad's film 12 Years a Slave won for best feature. The movie also won best screenplay, and Lupita Nyong'o won best supporting female for her role in the film. Brad and Angelina's award-show stop comes just days after Angelina visited refugees in Lebanon on behalf of the United Nations High Commissioner For Refugees. The actress made the trip to meet with refugees who had been displaced due to the Syrian civil war on Monday, then returned to LA where she's supporting Brad at the Spirit Awards. See all the pictures from the couple's award-show date!
item.dc:creator: Laura Marie Meyers
item.search_title: Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie at the Spirit Awards 2014

item.title: Join Us LIVE For Oscars Tonight!
item.description:
It has been another exciting award season, and we can't wait for the big finale: The Oscars! Will Jennifer Lawrence wear another beautiful gown from Dior? Will newcomer Lupita Nyong'o take home an Oscar? And who will make us swoon the most: Bradley, Jared, or Leo? We're can't wait to see the show and find out who will be taking home the awards!

Join us LIVE today starting at 6 p.m. EST/3 p.m. PST as we begin live on the red carpet with Lindsay Miller and then head in studio for the show. Use #POPSUGAROscars to join the conversation. Watch Now!

The Academy Awards air on ABC at 8:30 p.m. EST/5:30 p.m. PST.
item.dc:creator: Molly Goodson
item.search_title: Live Oscars Show 2014

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel Plays Limo Driver For Rob Ford
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel's comedic hijinks aren't limited to his late-night desk. The comedian made a special trip to LAX on Saturday to give Toronto Mayor Rob Ford a warm welcome to LA. Donning a cap and suit fit for a driver, Jimmy met Rob in baggage claim and offered the controversial political figure a ride to his hotel. The stunt comes after Rob announced plans to rub shoulders with the stars at the Oscars on Sunday. Before his flight from Toronto took off, the mayor reportedly told the Toronto Sun, "I am going to the Oscars. It's going to be fun." Hardly a stranger to grabbing headlines, Rob gained international fame after he admitted to using various drugs, including crack cocaine. Keep reading to see Rob's arrival.
item.dc:creator: Nick Maslow
item.search_title: Jimmy Kimmel Gives Rob Ford a Ride From LAX Before Oscars

item.title: Heavy Rain Threatens the Oscars Red Carpet
item.description:
In the midst of the worst drought in California history, rain continued to pummel LA on Saturday. And while the eight inches of much-needed showers doesn't even begin to meet the region's needs, fears are mounting that it just might succeed at ruining the most anticipated red carpet celebration of the year: the Oscars. On Friday, workers rushed to remove what looked like a small pond forming on the very steps that stars like Cate Blanchett and Brad Pitt are expected to grace at the Dolby Theatre. With the state on high alert, Oscars organizers are paying close attention to the weather forecast. "We're prepared to welcome our guests regardless of the weather," a spokesperson said.

Mud flow and mandatory evacuations have hit nearby areas like Azusa, Glendora, and Monrovia. As of Saturday, meteorologists predicted a 40 percent chance of rain and a high of 63 degrees in LA on Sunday. That's down from the 80 percent chance of rain on Saturday, but organizers aren't taking any chances. Plastic covers have been laid out, and massive roofs have been erected, covering the red carpet and media spots where hundreds of celebrities and journalists will gather to share the show with the world, come rain or shine. "There's no perfect science to rain planning," said Joe Lewis, a red carpet preshow associate producer. "It's going to leak. There's going to be rain. We're just trying to keep it as dry as possible for show day." According to Joe, people will work overnight to get the arrivals area in the best shape possible. Keep reading to see photos of the rain-ravaged red carpet.
item.dc:creator: Nick Maslow
item.search_title: Oscars Rain and Weather Forecast | Red Carpet Photos

item.title: Nobody's Having as Much Fun as Jared Leto
item.description: Between the selfies and the silly facial expressions, Jared Leto topped the list as most spirited at the Spirit Awards in Santa Monica on Saturday. The actor brought his boisterous antics to the red carpet, snapping selfies with the photographers ahead of the show. He then won best supporting male, thanks to his performance in Dallas Buyers Club and took the opportunity to give Lupita Nyong'o a shout-out, calling her his "future ex-wife." Jared touched down in LA earlier this week after spending time overseas with his band, Thirty Seconds to Mars. The guys hit the stage in France, Norway, and Germany before heading back to the states so Jared could prep for his big Oscars weekend! He hosted a star-studded party on Friday night and is likely gearing up for Sunday's show, where he could be taking home his very first Academy Award. Keep reading to see photos of Jared at the Spirit Awards!
item.dc:creator: Brittney Stephens
item.search_title: Jared Leto at the Spirit Awards 2014

item.title: Kristen Bell and Dax Shepard Are the Cutest Red Carpet Pair
item.description: Kristen Bell cracked up alongside Dax Shepard at Saturday's Spirit Awards in Santa Monica, with Dax copying her over-the-shoulder pose on the red carpet. The actress wore a blue strapless Reem Acra dress for the occasion, all smiles while posing for pictures. She and Dax shared a sweet kiss on the red carpet before Kristen took the stage to present with Joseph Gordon-Levitt, and she'll also be presenting at Sunday's Academy Awards, where her movie Frozen is up for best animated feature film. This weekend's award shows come at an exciting time for Kristen, as it's only two weeks until the Veronica Mars movie is released. In the meantime, though, fans can enjoy the first minutes of the Veronica Mars movie, which serve as a bit of a recap for those who haven't watched the show in a while. Take a look at Kristen's adorable red carpet moments with Dax!
item.dc:creator: Laura Marie Meyers
item.search_title: Kristen Bell and Dax Shepard at the Spirit Awards 2014

item.title: It's Already a Winning Weekend For Matthew McConaughey
item.description: Matthew McConaughey's winning streak continued at the Spirit Awards in LA on Saturday, with the actor taking home yet another victory. After hitting the stage with Reese Witherspoon, Matthew joined the rest of the Spirit Award winners when he was accepted the best male lead award for his role in Dallas Buyers Club. Donning a bronze suit to coordinate with his gold statue, Matthew showed us yet again how he's been giving the ladies a run for their money on the red carpet this award season. Meanwhile, his wife, Camila Alves, made a style statement of her own in a crisp white jumpsuit. While Matthew just may take home another trophy at Sunday's Oscars, he's also in the running for the sexiest man of award season title!
item.dc:creator: Nick Maslow
item.search_title: Matthew McConaughey at the Spirit Awards 2014
